segments.text: Oh hi , Linda , this is Todd .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , Todd , how nice to hear your voice !
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Linda , I just wanted to say that I had a wonderful evening with you last Friday .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I really enjoyed our evening together , Todd .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I had fun also and was wondering if you would like to go hiking with me in the mountains on Saturday .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Hiking would be perfect ! May I bring along a picnic lunch for us to share ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: A picnic lunch would be a nice thing to have along .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'll work on the lunch , and you can work out the details of where we will go . What time will you be at my house ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Nine would be good , don't you think ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Nine is good . See you on Saturday !
segments.speaker: S2
